Check that debug and monitor methods from Command Line API works with bound function.
debug foo and bar
call foo and bar
paused in foo
paused in boo
undebug foo and bar
call foo and bar
monitor foo and bar
call foo and bar
function foo called
function boo called
unmonitor foo and bar
call foo and bar
monitor and debug bar
call bar
function boo called
paused in boo
undebug bar
call bar
function boo called
debug and unmonitor bar
call bar
paused in boo
